channel.title: About on Nikiforos Pittaras
channel.description: Recent content in About on Nikiforos Pittaras

item.title: AGI Safety Fundamentals Course 2022 project
item.description: In the 2022 AGI Safety Fundamentals course I worked on toy investigations on deceptively aligned agents in a toy environment. You can find relevant code, results and ideas for future work / extensions in this gitlab repository.

item.title: Code
item.description: Software I use and like Productivity Man pages for human beings: cheat, tldr and how2. RSI-prevention with good typing and modal editing with vim. Vimify browser with vimvixen, cVim and wasavi. Editor war stalemate: spacemacs. Omni-present terminal with dolphin or yakuake F-key magic. Terminal multiplexing with tmux. Screenshot goodness with flameshot. Leisure Terminal youtube player: mps-youtube

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Machine Learning scientist, currently working in different ML Research and Engineering roles in multiple domains, including Argument Mining, Multimodal Neurodegenerative Disease Prediction, AI Safety and Alignment. You can get a short (updated 08-2022) and a long (out of date, but with uni courses / projects) version of my CV. Alternatively, check out a tl;dr version below. Education PhD in machine learning, from the Informatics and Telecommunications department (DIT) of the University of Athens (UoA), co-supervised by the Institute of Informatics and Telecommunications (IIT) of the National Center for Scientific Research Demokritos (NCSRD) , funded by the St.
